fact: My favourite subject in high school was Physics, but it is too hard.
I failed Biology for entire year in sec school, but I still got A in O-level Biology.
I am good at swimming, but I don't know how to dive until now.
I invented the Theory of Playing Pool and it always worked. However, neither my friends and I don't know what exactly the theory is.
History is an only subject I have talents in, among those Art subjects.
I want to be a game developer in the near future.
My height stopped growing since I was 16 years old.
I like playing computer games because it feels more "real" in the unreal world.
I like eating Box B in McDonald, but it is not sold in Canada.
I like the chili sause in chicken rice.
I can't eat pickle.
My favourite game is Witcher 3.
I believe "The best is yet to be".
I have bad memory, so I am bad in language subject.
I wanted to study business for university. But I realized I would have no startup fund.
I don't like strawberry ice-cream, strawberry snacks and strawberry...
I keep forgetting people's name
My record of longest sleep length is 14 hours.
I prefer sweet pop-corn.
I like drinking Coke Diet than Coke Zero.
I like playing League of Legend Aram.
I have been to more than ten countries.
I believe everybody has a destiny, but one can choose the attitudes to face it.
I am addicted to The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild.
I can cook, but only eatable by myself.
